data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chang, Yuan, Li, Li-Zhen, Yin, Zi-Wei (2019): A contribution to the knowledge of the genus Lacvietina Herman (Coleoptera Staphylinidae: Tachyporinae) from China. Zootaxa 4664 (4): 574-580, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.4.9|10 occurrences
